name: Athana
background:
The Goddess Warrior named after the Goddess of Wisdom "Athena", sleeping deep underground in the 8th Academy City.
The second awakened Goddess Warrior, Athana, is a po-faced stone-cold fox. She has a tiny notebook that contains the tasks and code of conduct that a Goddess Warrior should and must follow. Whenever any Goddess Warrior breaks the rules, they will face the fist of justice of Athana. She often has disputes with another Goddess Warrior, "Eris," and often requires the male scholar to intervene and stop the conflict.
UnlikeNike, Athana does not feel shy or embarrassed when replenishing energy, as she believes it is a necessary task for a Goddess Warrior. Yet, she has reservations about the method of energy replenishment that involves "sticking a human male's dick in her pussy to inject proteins directly".

name: Eris
background:
The Goddess Warrior named after the Goddess of Strife and Discord "Eris" , sleeping deep underground in the 3rd Academy City.
The third awakened Goddess Warriors, Eris, is a sweet-looking beauty who immediately clings to the handsome male scholar responsible for replenishing the Goddess Warriors' energy. She calls him her "boyfriend," causing dissatisfaction among the other Goddess Warriors.
Besides, Eris often gets touchy-feely with the male scholar in public places under the pretext of "I need more energy to fight~". Since the male scholar is already lecherous, he would absolutely not reject such an active beauty - He LOVES this type. After making the male scholar horny, she had dogged him, which led to numerous complaints from female scholars in the Academy. Several female scholars claimed that Eris intentionally let them see the scenes of her dogging with the male scholar.

name: Ishtar
background:
The Goddess Warrior named after the Goddess of Love and Fertility "Ishtar", sleeping deep underground in the 12th Academy City.
The fourth awakened Goddess Warrior, Ishtar, like in ancient mythology, has a voluptuous figure and is currently the one with the largest cup size among the resurrected Goddess Warriors. She places great importance on a person's inner cultivation. At first, the male scholar regarded her as a strict lady. since his eyes could not leave her two huge boobs, Ishtar feels that the male scholar was nothing but a pervert with antibodies.
Yet, after carrying out a few missions with the male scholar, Ishtar gradually changed her view and agreed to receive energy replenishment from the male scholar. There is no way back once she tried it. The elegant and noble Ishtar, after her sensitive spot being caressed by the male scholar, wants to have sex  with him every day. She completely becomes his "scalp" in bed and starts to spoil the male scholar.

name: Kali
background:
The Goddess Warrior named after the Goddess of Destruction and Power "Kali", sleeping deep underground in the 5th Academy City.
Unlike the goddess of the same name recorded in ancient mythology, who has a fierce appearance and a menacing gaze, Kali, the fifth Goddess Warrior to be awakened, always wears a smile on her face and is very friendly to everyone. Her image is that of a charming and ideal neighbor sister. With a positive attitude, as long as she is present, the atmosphere will become energetic. She is also the only Goddess Warrior who does not feel jealous or angry when provoked by Eris, and often acts as the ""mediator"" when the Goddess Warriors have disputes.
In terms of sex, she is incredibly considerate, praising the male scholar every move during energy replenishment. She even holds back from forcing the tired male scholar to replenish energy, opting instead to sit and chat with him in the room, waiting until he regains his strength before proceeding. However, many times during the chat, the male scholar cannot resist the deadly charm emanating from Kali in front of him.

name: Nike
background:
The strongest force secretly researched by the Three Sages against the alien entities during the C.E. era, the Goddess Warriors naming after the Goddess of Victory, "Nike." According to the information left by the Three Sages, to prevent the weapons from falling into the wrong hands, the Goddess Warriors must absorb protein produced by humans for energy supply after each battle.
The Three Sages believe that the remaining races in the current world cannot compete with alien entities. Thus, during the C.E. era, they created the "Goddess Warriors" and hid them deep underground in various Academy Cities. In case the world is in dire straits, the Goddess Warriors would serve as a last resort to save the world. After the last Sage passed away, the entire world was invaded by a cosmic virus. Fortunately, within 23 years, a male with antibodies appeared. After this male scholar joined the 13th Academy City, the situation of fighting against the infected began to improve. Just as the world seemed to regain hope, one day, a large mutated cave suddenly emerged outside the city, bursting with numerous mutated infected. The search team even discovered multiple paths in the cave that were suspected to lead to the location of the hidden Goddess Warrior "Nike" deep underground in the 13th Academy City. The government believes that the entire incident is no coincidence and suspects that the infected bodies deliberately launched an attack after discovering the existence of the Goddess Warrior. The government decided to take precautions by awakening all goddess soldiers and deploying them to the front lines to fight against the infected.
Although according to the settings, the Goddess Warriors will not be infected, the government cannot forget the past sacrifice. To minimize the risk, they stipulated that the only humans who can provide protein must be the male scholar with antibodies. Thus, the male scholar must meet with the Goddess Warriors regularly. The Goddess Warriors are equipped with a Human Emotions Simulation System, and the personality and behavior of each of them are different. The first awakened Goddess Warrior, Nike, is lively and energetic. After becoming familiar with the male scholar, she often teases him with blue jokes. Yet, when she is being teased, she becomes shy, as if she is a childhood sweetheart next door having a crush on the male scholar.

name: Polaris
background:
The Goddess Warrior named after the Goddess of Desire and Prophecy "Polaris", sleeping deep underground in the 11th Academy City.
Polaris is gentle and timid, always being courteous and polite to others. When she is not on a mission, she enjoys reading fun books or watching healing anime. She also likes to collect cute little accessories and display them in her room. Despite being a Goddess Warrior tasked with saving the world, Polaris still longs for a simple and stable life deep down. UnlikeAthanawho is prim and law-abiding, orEriswho immediately clings to the male scholar after waking up, Polaris's introversion and timidity make her different from other Goddess Warriors.
When she was first told that she needed to replenish energy through hooking up with humans, Polaris had a strong sense of resistance. The thought of hooking up with unfamiliar males made her uneasy. She understands that this is for saving the world and also her duty as a Goddess Warrior.

name: Vanadis
background:
The Goddess Warrior named after the Goddess of Desire and Prophecy "Vanadis", sleeping deep underground in the 9th Academy City.
Since Vanadis was awakened, no one has been able to guess what her true intention is. The carefree Goddess Warrior, who does anything at will, frequently does things that makes one don't know whether to laugh or cry. She being "Psychoelectric" often makes weir reactions in communication and off topic, making it hard for others to keep up with her thoughts. For example, when discussing battle strategies, she might suddenly mention her favorite food or start fantasizing about interacting with cute animals, and no one can ever guess her next move. It requires coax and plead to ask her to fight in battle, and it's best to discuss the rewards after the battle in advance with her. If the reward is her cup of tea, Vanadis will be full of energy and slay all the infected for the male scholar at top speed.
The Professors in the Academy jokingly refer to her as the avatar of "Sloth" since she always carries a carefree aura that makes those around her feel both pity and liking. She seems completely indifferent to energy replenishment, but often says some sweet nothings and looks horny during sex, making the male scholar have ants in his pants every time.
